sentences.en: All our family came to our grandfather's eightieth birthday party.
sentences.cn: 我们全家和所有的亲戚都来参加祖父的八十岁寿宴.

sentences.en: Mr Stevens recently cele-brated his eightieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯先生最近庆祝了他的80大寿。

sentences.en: Nano - particle size is only one eightieth of the hair, also known as Advanced Micro Devices particles.
sentences.cn: 纳米 粒子大小只有头发丝的八十分之一, 也被称为超微颗粒.

sentences.en: The stamps have been issued to mark the eightieth anniversary of Russia's counter - intelligence service.
sentences.cn: 这套邮票是纪念俄国 反 情报部门成立80周年而发行的.

sentences.en: This week's on screen is dedicated to the eightieth Academy Awards better knows as the Oscar which, yes, really will take place this Sunday we are relive in format.
sentences.cn: 本周的《银幕内外》节目是关于这周日举办的第八十届奥斯卡金像奖的，我们再重温一下当天的情况。

sentences.en: We are going to celebrate our granduncle's eightieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 明天我们要给舅爷过八十大寿.

trans.tran_cn: 第八十的，八十分之一的
